title: On Auction Block: Draft Of 'Like A Rolling Stone,' And Some Doodles
teaser: Sotheby's will be auctioning what it claims to be the only known surviving draft of the final lyrics for Bob Dylan's "Like a Rolling Stone," as part of the auction house's rock and pop music sale.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
